title: How to contact Google directly?
content:
I purchased my pixel 5 two months ago.  Last week I dropped it.  The screen has a small crack and everything works fine except the rear camera (the main reason I bought this phone).  I took it in to a a certified shop and they said I would need to replace the entire motherboard, which combined with a new screen would cost me more than a new phone.

There has to be another way.
